title: Bounty _BOX
author: Bounty _BOX
created_time: April 28, 2023, 05:35:46 PMLast edit: May 05, 2023, 04:18:45 AM by Bounty _BOX
content: _________________________________________________________ Website          Twitter          Telegram          Facebook          Telegram _________________________________________________________1. Bounty campaign will be managed by  bounty_box2. All participants must join the Fart coin 's official  Telegram group .3. All participants must join bounty_Box  Telegram group .4. Talking about the bounty in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group.Please ask your bounty-related questions in the Bounty_box Group.5. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.6. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.7. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed.8. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.Proof Of Registration Post Format:Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:BSC Wallet Address: Twitter _50%Facebook _25%Telegram _25%WEEK LIST1 WEEK _ 29_04 _ 04_05Rewards:1. Have more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 3000 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,000 followers: 5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow FART COIN  Twitter page .2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 500 followers.3. Participants have to make 2 new tweets and 3 retweets per week (maximum 1 retweet and 1 Tweet per day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 12 hours minimum.5. Participants must use : #lottery @FARTCOINGO #luck #fartcoin #retweet #like Join Here Rewards:1. Have more than 500 Friends: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 3000 Friends: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 Friends: 3 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must like FART COIN  Facebook page .2. Participants must  have 500+ Friends3. Participants have to make 2 new posts and 3 shares per week (maximum 2 post/share per day).4. Time gap between 2 post/share needs to be 12 hours minimum.5. Participants must use: #lottery @FARTCOINGO #luck #fartcoin #retweet #like Join Here  Spreadsheet Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Participants have to use their name on telegram account that shouldn’t promote other projects.2. Profile picture shouldn’t promote any other project.3. Write at least 2 constructive messages on this group: https://t.me/fartcoingo and 3 messages weekly in other crypto related telegram groups with a minimum of 1k members.Posts/messages must be constructive, useful, and in a way that will not be considered as spamming.4. Deleted messages will not be counted.5. Report your telegram message links weekly.6. You must wear FART COIN avatar and text until the end of the campaign. everyone must use Logo  Join Here  Mastersheet
